c74object.name: notify
c74object.digest: Dump all notes from a dictionary ordered by absolute timestamp
c74object.description: The notify object accepts a dictionary name as an argument and, when it receives a bang, it extracts all notes (timestamped events) from the dictionary, sorts them chronologically by absolute timestamp, clears the original dictionary, and outputs the notes sequentially from its outlets.

inlet.description: A bang message triggers the gathering of all notes from the referenced dictionary. The notes are then sorted, the dictionary is cleared, and the notes are output sequentially.

outlet.description: A 2-item list consisting of the absolute timestamp (float) and the score (float).
The offset associated with the bar containing the note.
The name of the track where the note was found.
The palette name associated with the bar containing the note.
If the verbose attribute is enabled, this outlet provides status messages.

objarg.name: dictionary-name
objarg.digest: Name of the dictionary to reference
objarg.description: The name of the external dict object that notify will read from and clear.

method.name: bang
method.description: In the leftmost inlet, a bang triggers the gathering of all notes from the referenced dictionary. The notes are then sorted, the dictionary is cleared, and the notes are output sequentially from the outlets.

attr.name: verbose
attr.description: When enabled (1), adds a rightmost outlet for verbose logging messages and outputs status information to it.
